ssl.title: SSL
ssl.summary: Enable / disable HTTPS for an Undertow HTTP server. By default the `default-server` is used, but other server names can be specified as well.

management-ssl.title: Management SSL
management-ssl.summary: Enable / disable SSL for a given management interface. By default the `http-interface` is used, but other management interface can be targeted as well.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.summary: Enable / disable statistics for all or a selection of subsystems.

logging.title: Logging
logging.summary: Configure the logging subsystem, change the log level of the `ROOT` and other categories and apply the changes to the `CONSOLE` and other handlers.

reverse-proxy.title: Reverse proxy
reverse-proxy.summary: Create and configure a reverse proxy in the Undertow subsystem.

data-source.title: Data source
data-source.summary: Create and configure XA and non-XA data sources.
